channel.title: Can you really trust anybody these days?
channel.description:
Trust - It is something that is very... shall we say.. sacred.. it's like your virginity.. Once you lose it, it never comes back to you. The lack of innocence is always there.
Can you really trust anybody anymore? There are only a hand full of people I can mention that I can/dp truly trust/respect. But all the liars, scammers, cheaters etc. They come on to you so.. truthful, so caring and you fall for it.
Notice, some of your 'Best' friends will deceive you. They will (sometimes) take what's yours for them selves. You understand, right?
It's sad how you can't trust anyone anymore...
Discuss.

item.title: Can you really trust anybody these days?
item.dc:creator: @chewwie chewwie
item.description:
@chewwie wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:28, topic:68137”][quote author=chewwie link=topic=99715.msg1031154#msg1031154 date=1174401009]
i trust my gold fish with anythink cause there brain span is 10 sec so they will not tell no1!!!
[/quote]
Your forgetting the fact goldfish cant talk.[/quote]

and thats why i trust them…

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“93dcthugs93, post:14, topic:68137”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=99715.msg1023960#msg1023960 date=1174240275]
Leave a wallet on a park bench and walk away for 5 minutes and when you come back guaranteed its gone no matter where you live and the chances of getting it back are slim.

I trust no one.

[/quote]

Who does that anyways?[/quote]

Does is matter?

item.title: Can you really trust anybody these days?
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

[quote=“kennyboy93, post:23, topic:68137”]Here’s a thought.
Don’t trust anyone online that you don’t trust in real life. I mean ANYONE.
Even if it’s Jagex staff…umm…wouldn’t trust them either way.
But then how do you trust someone in real life. Simple. Test them.
Let them hold something, possess something that they want (but you can afford to lose). If they’re gone in 30 secs, track them down and shoot them.

Oh…and you can ALWAYS trust a cheater, as long as you’re NOT playing against them.[/quote]

You trust them while entering your credit card number/Cvv2 don’t you? ++ They are a company they could easily be trusted (as a company).

Read full topic

item.title: Can you really trust anybody these days?
item.dc:creator: @kennyboy93 kennyboy93
item.description:
@kennyboy93 wrote:

Here’s a thought.
Don’t trust anyone online that you don’t trust in real life. I mean ANYONE.
Even if it’s Jagex staff…umm…wouldn’t trust them either way.
But then how do you trust someone in real life. Simple. Test them.
Let them hold something, possess something that they want (but you can afford to lose). If they’re gone in 30 secs, track them down and shoot them.

Oh…and you can ALWAYS trust a cheater, as long as you’re NOT playing against them.

Read full topic

@RXVL wrote:

4 People/objects I can trust:

  1. My best friend, cuz hes always there.
  2. My GF, same reason.
  3. Zamorak (other owner of ZS) great helper and wouldn’t abandon me for shit.
  4. Pot. Good old pot. Its always there when you need it and it never lies. It always makes you happy and you cant go wrong.

Lawl.

item.dc:creator: @The_Cursed The Cursed
item.description:
@The_Cursed wrote:

i have never trusted anyone. Maybe this is because i dont have a brother or a sister so i grew up with keeping my secrets for myself. Untill this day i still have secrets that nobody knows, except me.

For me it’s better to trust nobody

Read full topic
item.source: Can you really trust anybody these days?

item.title: Can you really trust anybody these days?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Back in september 06 i trusted nobody, after the closure of my very lovely school and loosing tonnes of friends in april, the school had finally re-opened, but with only 16 people in my year.
I didnt trust anyone and spent most of my break with my head inbetween my knees at break on a bench near my playing field.
Eventually after a month of that i began trusting people, i actually was having a good time.
But oct 06 everything went wrong, got suspended because of failing a drugs test. (ive never done drugs). A week later i proved my innocents by having a proffesional hair drug test done in london for £90. The school invited me back, but didnt apologise and didnt even aknowledge what happened to me, i had lost my faith and trust in everything at that point.
i stayed off school another 2 months and had a few home schooling sessions.
After a while news came that my head master was being sacked for drug testing kids without parents permission.
After i heard that news i wanted to go back. And another few months have passed now and my trust level is back at a great level, i just finished my school performance of guys and dolls yesterday and had an awesome time.

I just wrote that out to say that trust can be lost, but despite what is said in the first post here, it can eventually come back, no matter what.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you really trust anybody these days?
